content.title: Mapping the UI Elements
content.body:
• From the left pane of the Mapping Editor, expand Services > Service-RecipientStorage$Recipients$get, > records{collection}.
    From the right pane of the Mapping Editor, expand Forms > frmEditRecipients.
  • From the left pane of the Mapping Editor select RecipientID{number}.
    From the right pane of the Mapping Editor, expand TextField - tbxPayeeID and select text{string}.
  • From the left pane of the Mapping Editor select FirstName{string}.
    From the right pane of the Mapping Editor, expand TextField - tbxFirstName and select text{string}.
